00012 const MMLAttribute **MMLElement::defatt[MML::numElements];
00013 bool MMLElement::defset[MML::numElements];
00014 uint MMLElement::count = 0;
00015 
00016 MMLElement::MMLElement(MML::Element e, MMLDocument *o)
00017         : MMLNode(o), id(e) {
00018         attributesvalid = true;
00019         numAtts = MML::attListLen[id];
00020         initAtts();
00021         // allocate memory for pointers to default attribute values
00022         if (count++ == 0) {
00023                 //defatt = new MMLAttribute**[numElements];
00024                 for (uint i=0; i<MML::numElements; ++i) {
00025                         defatt[i] = 0;
00026                         defset[i] = false;
00027                 }
00028         }
00029         if (defatt[id] == 0) {
00030                 defatt[id] = new const MMLAttribute*[numAtts];
00031                 for (short i=0; i<numAtts; ++i) {
00032                         defatt[id][i] = 0;
00033                 }
00034         }
00035 }
00036 MMLElement::~MMLElement() {
00037         deleteAtts();
00038         if (--count == 0) {
00039                 for (uint i=0; i<MML::numElements; ++i) {
00040                         if (defatt[i]) {
00041                                 short n = MML::attListLen[i];
00042                                 for (short j=0; j<n; ++j) {
00043                                         if (defatt[i][j]) {
00044                                                 delete defatt[i][j];
00045                                         }
00046                                 }
00047                                 delete [] defatt[i];
00048                         }
00049                         defset[i] = false;
00050                 }
00051         }
00052 }
00053 const char *
00054 MMLElement::tagName() const {
00055         return MML::elementTag[id];
00056 }
00057 void
00058 MMLElement::initAtts() {
00059         att = new const MMLAttribute*[numAtts];
00060         tmpatt = new const MMLAttribute*[numAtts];
00061         for (short i=0; i<numAtts; ++i) {
00062                 att[i] = 0;
00063         }
00064 }
00065 /* Delete the array that stores the MMLAttributes associated with this element.
00066    The array which temporarily holds the global values. */
00067 void
00068 MMLElement::deleteAtts() {
00069         if (att) {
00070                 for (short i=0; i<numAtts; ++i) {
00071                         if (att[i] && att[i]->cleanup) {
00072                                 delete att[i];
00073                         }
00074                 }
00075                 delete [] att;
00076                 delete [] tmpatt;
00077         }
00078 }
00079 void
00080 MMLElement::setAttribute(const char *name, const DOMString &value) {
00081         if (!strcmp(name, "color")) {
00082                 name = "mathcolor";
00083         } else if (!strcmp(name, "background")) {
00084                 name = "mathbackground";
00085         }
00086         int pos = MML::createAttribute(name, value, id, att);
00087         if (pos == -1) {
00088                 invalidAttribute(name);
00089         } else if (pos == -1) {
00090                 invalidValue(name, value);
00091         }
00092 }
00093 void
00094 MMLElement::invalidAttribute(const char *n) {
00095         errmsg = "Attribute '";
00096         errmsg += n;
00097         errmsg += "' not allowed in element ";
00098         errmsg += tagName();
00099         errmsg += ".";
00100         attributesvalid = false;
00101 }
00102 void
00103 MMLElement::invalidValue(const char *name, const DOMString &value) {
00104         errmsg = "attribute '";
00105         errmsg += name;
00106         errmsg += "' cannot have value '"+value+"' in element ";
00107         errmsg += tagName();
00108         errmsg += ".";
00109         attributesvalid = false;
00110 }
00111 void
00112 MMLElement::layout(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00113         // reset the coordinates and dimensions
00114         gui->resetCoords();
00115         a->setAttributes(this);
00116         doLayout(a);
00117         a->unsetAttributes(this);
00118         gui->firstviewport = gui->lastviewport = -1;
00119 }
00120 void
00121 MMLElement::paint(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00122         // only draw if the element is present in the current viewport
00123         if (!drawInViewPort(owner->currentViewNo())) return;
00124         a->setAttributes(this);
00125         a->p->translate(gui->x, gui->y);
00126         int nearness = -1;
00127         MathCursor *mc = owner->cursor();
00128         if (mc) {
00129                 nearness = mc->nearness(this);
00130         }
00131         if (mc && mc->isSelected(this)) {
00132                 // draw background for selected
00133                 MathColor sb = a->p->selectionColor();
00134                 a->setAttribute(MML::MATHBACKGROUND, sb);
00135                 a->p->fillRect(0, -gui->ascent, gui->width,
00136                         gui->ascent+gui->descent);
00137         } else if (nearness >= 0 && mc->collapsed()) {
00138                 MathColor sb = a->p->highlightColor(nearness);
00139                 MathColor sc = a->p->highlightColor(0);
00140                 a->setAttribute(MML::MATHBACKGROUND, sb);
00141                 a->p->fillRect(0, -gui->ascent, gui->width,
00142                         gui->ascent + gui->descent, sb, sc);
00143         }
00144         doPaint(a);
00145         // draw caret
00146         if (mc && mc->container() == this) {
00147                 MMLNode *n = mc->rightNode();
00148                 float cx, ca, cd;
00149                 if (n) {
00150                         cx = n->getX();
00151                 } else {
00152                         n = mc->leftNode();
00153                         if (n) {
00154                                 cx = n->getX()+n->getWidth();
00155                         } else {
00156                                 cx = gui->width;
00157                         }
00158                 }
00159                 if (n) {
00160                         cd = n->getDescent() + n->getY();
00161                         ca = n->getAscent() - n->getY();
00162                 } else {
00163                         cd = gui->descent;
00164                         ca = gui->ascent;
00165                 }
00166                 a->p->drawLine(cx, -ca, cx, cd, 2);
00167         }
00168         a->p->translate(-gui->x,-gui->y);
00169         a->unsetAttributes(this);
00170 }
00171 void
00172 MMLElement::normalize() {
00173         MMLNode *p;
00174         MMLText *t = 0;
00175         p = first;
00176         while (p) {
00177                 if (p->isText()) {
00178                         MMLText *t2 = static_cast<MMLText *>(p);
00179                         if (t) {
00180                                 t->appendData(t2->data());
00181                                 removeChild(t2);
00182                                 p = t;
00183                         } else {
00184                                 t = t2;
00185                         }
00186                 } else {
00187                         t = 0;
00188                 }
00189                 p = getNext(p);
00190         }
00191         validated = false;
00192 }
00193 // this is a check for non-token elements: it checks that there are no
00194 // nodes of type text
00195 // do not call this function on a known invalid function, because
00196 // initially the bool 'valid' is set to true
00197 void
00198 MMLElement::validateChildren(int num, bool orMore) {
00199         int count = 0;
00200         // check the number of arguments
00201         MMLNode *n;
00202         valid = true;
00203         for (n = first; valid && n; n = getNext(n)) {
00204                 valid = !n->isText();
00205                 count++;
00206         }
00207         if (!valid) {
00208                 errmsg = "Element of type ";
00209                 errmsg += tagName();
00210                 errmsg += " may not contain text without markup.";
00211                 return;
00212         }
00213         if (num >= 0) { // num < 0 means: any number is ok
00214                 if (orMore && count < num) {
00215                         errmsg = "Element of type ";
00216                         errmsg += tagName();
00217                         errmsg += " must contain at least "
00218                                 + DOMString::number(num) + " children.";
00219                         valid = false;
00220                         return;
00221                 }
00222                 if (!orMore && count != num) {
00223                         errmsg = "Element of type ";
00224                         errmsg += tagName();
00225                         errmsg += " must contain exactly "
00226                                 + DOMString::number(num) + " children.";
00227                         valid = false;
00228                         return;
00229                 }
00230         }
00231         // validate all children, this not done before because it is expensive
00232         // and useless if the number of children is not correct
00233         // also, stop validating as soon as one element is invalid
00234         valid = true;
00235         for (n = first; valid && n; n = getNext(n)) {
00236                 valid = n->validate();
00237         }
00238 }
